title: Finding Your Stage Legs
description: Master the fundamentals of touch typing through theatrical exercises

scenes.name: Table Read
scenes.description: Get comfortable with the home row keys
scenes.warmUp: Place your fingers on the home row: ASDF JKL;

exercises.title: Finding Your Mark
exercises.script: asdf jkl; asdf jkl; asdf jkl;
exercises.tips: Rest your fingers lightly on these keys - they're your home base

exercises.title: First Lines
exercises.script: sad fad lad ask flask salad
exercises.tips: These words use only home row keys

exercises.title: Opening Monologue
exercises.script: A sad lad asks dad. Flask falls; salad fades.

scenes.name: Blocking Rehearsal
scenes.description: Learn to move beyond the home row
scenes.warmUp: Reach up to QWER UIOP and back to home

exercises.title: Reaching for the Stars
exercises.script: qwer uiop qwer uiop asdf jkl;
exercises.tips: Always return to home position after reaching

exercises.title: Elevated Dialogue
exercises.script: we are here for our play today
exercises.tips: Common words using upper row keys

exercises.title: Full Stage Movement
exercises.script: The quick red fox jumped over the lazy brown dog
exercises.tips: Combining home and upper rows smoothly

scenes.name: Costume Fitting
scenes.description: Add the lower row to your repertoire
scenes.warmUp: Drop down to ZXCV NM,. and return

exercises.title: Finding Your Foundation
exercises.script: zxcv nm,. zxcv nm,. asdf jkl;
exercises.tips: The lower row completes your keyboard coverage

exercises.title: Grounded Performance
exercises.script: move can zoom next mix come

exercises.title: The Complete Performer
exercises.script: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
exercises.tips: The famous pangram uses every letter!
